location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 4954 of 1850 from Henry Goldsmid, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Major Atkins Hamerton, Her Majesty's Consul and Honorable Company's Agent in the Dominions of His Highness the Imam of Muscat

mods.abstract: The letter from Henry Goldsmid is enclosed with a copy of Samuel Hennell's letter to the Persian British Envoy of 1 August 1850 (see folio 22). A copy of the covering letter has been sent to the Persian Gulf Resident for reference.
